title: The Mirror Words

testCase5.input: A man a plan a canal Panama
testCase5.expectedOutput: amanaP lanac a nalp a nam A

description:
# The Mirror Words

Write a program that reads a single line of input containing a word or a sentence and outputs the reversed version of that input. Each word and sentence should be reversed character by character. The input will only contain lowercase and uppercase letters and spaces. The input length will not exceed 100 characters.

## Example 1

Input:

~~~txt
goldfish
~~~

Output:

~~~txt
hsifdlog
~~~

## Example 2

Input:

~~~txt
racecar
~~~

Output:

~~~txt
racecar
~~~
